title: 为何在服务器npcMOD显示Unable to find npc无法使用
author: AzhangzhefuA
txt_content:
我服1.7.2+MCPC
放置NPC的时候会显示Unable to find npc
然后没有NPC
请问这是怎么回事？求解。。。

这是NPC配置
 #Disable Chat Bubbles
EnableChatBubbles=true

#Uses unique entities ids
UseUniqueEntities=true

#To use this UseUniqueEntities has to be false
EntityStartId=120

#Navigation search range for NPCs. Not recommended to increase if you have a slow pc or on a server
NpcNavRange=32

#Set to true if you want the dialog command option to be able to use op commands like tp etc
NpcUseOpCommands=false

InventoryGuiEnabled=true

#Enables CustomNpcs startup update message
EnableUpdateChecker=true

#Set to false if you want to disable guns
GunsEnabled=true

#Only ops can create and edit npcs
OpsOnly=true

#0: Options dialog, 1: Wheel dialog
DialogType=0

#Default interact line. Leave empty to not have one
DefaultInteractLine=Hello @p

#Start Id for enchants
EnchantStartId=100

replies.author: woodytt
replies.txt_content: 如果你装的mod和服务端版本没有问题，估计是你把OpsOnly=true设了，但是你没开op权限，试试输入/op [你的id]然后再用npc模组

replies.author: AzhangzhefuA
replies.txt_content:
woodytt 发表于 2015-2-15 17:28
如果你装的mod和服务端版本没有问题，估计是你把OpsOnly=true设了，但是你没开op权限，试试输入/op [你的id ...
你觉得我会犯这种错误吗？

replies.author: woodytt
replies.txt_content:
AzhangzhefuA 发表于 2015-2-15 18:11
你觉得我会犯这种错误吗？
你也没事先说明啊23333333
发一堆config有屁用23333333
你是单机还是服务器？版本冲突么？还装别的什么了？情况都不说清楚还以为你熊孩子233333

replies.author: woodytt
replies.txt_content:
好吧，是服务器啊，
我开了一个1.7.10的服用了npc模组是没有这种问题的。

replies.author: woodytt
replies.txt_content:
#Disable Chat Bubbles
EnableChatBubbles=true

#Uses unique entities ids
UseUniqueEntities=true

#To use this UseUniqueEntities has to be false
EntityStartId=120

#Navigation search range for NPCs. Not recommended to increase if you have a slow pc or on a server
NpcNavRange=32

#Set to true if you want the dialog command option to be able to use op commands like tp etc
NpcUseOpCommands=true

InventoryGuiEnabled=true

DisableExtraItems=false

DisableExtraBlock=false

DisableEnchants=false

#Enables CustomNpcs startup update message
EnableUpdateChecker=true

#Only ops can create and edit npcs
OpsOnly=true

#0: Options dialog, 1: Wheel dialog
DialogType=0

#Default interact line. Leave empty to not have one
DefaultInteractLine=你好 @p！

#Start Id for enchants
EnchantStartId=100

#Number of chunk loading npcs that can be active at the same time
ChuckLoaders=20

#Set to false if you want to disable guns
GunsEnabled=true

#Enables leaves decay
LeavesDecayEnabled=true

#Enables Vine Growth
VineGrowthEnabled=true

#Enables Ice Melting
IceMeltsEnabled=true

这是我的config
